quote_first: Romanov paced up and down the small anteroom impatiently, but the secretary did not return until the hands on the clock were in a straight line. At
quote_last: , Romanov was ushered into the chairman’s room.
title: A Matter of Honor
author: Jeffrey Archer

title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
author: Mark Haddon

quote_last: , a hackney-carriage drove up to the steps of the Stahovs’s villa, and a man, still young, of prepossessing appearance, simply and elegantly dressed, stepped out of it and sent up his name.
title: On the Eve
author: Ivan Turgenev
